pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### QuotefancyYou can use to this Package to get random quotes as Text or Images. You can Download Quote too!Install it as `pip install quotefancy`#### Usage Guide ```from quotefancy import get_quote# Downloading quote as Imageget_quote(type='img', download=True)# Getting as Textprint(get_quote(type='text'))```#### Copyright- [New-Dev](https://github.com/New-dev0)
